price(string).details: returns the asset price in USD, 6 decimal digits. Compatible with the Open Price Feed.

priceMax(string).details: get the price of asset in USD, 8 decimal digits. Not needed for now

priceMin(string).details: get the price of asset in ETH, 8 decimal digits.

setEthPriceMinMax(uint256,uint256).details: sets the min and max price of ETH in USD, 6 decimal digits

setPrice(string,uint256).details: sets the price of the asset in USD, 6 decimal digits

setTokPriceMinMax(string,uint256,uint256.details: sets the prices Min Max for a specific symbol in ETH, 8 decimal digits

userdoc.notice: Mock of both price Oracle and min max oracles
